title: Start
body:
You are lost. As you walk through the forest, you encounter the path fork from left to right. Where do you go?
[[Left|LeftRoad.1]]
[[Right|RightRoad.1]]

title: LeftRoad.1
body:
Further along the way, you encounter a river. Do you cross the river?
<<changeBG red>>
[[Cross the river|RiverCross]]
[[Go back|LeftRoadBack]]

title: RightRoad.1
body:
WE got o right road.
Where do go?
[img]cow.png[/img]
<<showimage image.png 0,0>>
asdfhasdfs
[[Left|RR.Left]]
[[Right|RR.Right]]

title: LeftRoadBack
body:
As you went back, you found a new forking path. The path was not here before.
Do you go left or right?
[[Left|Start]]
[[Right|NewMagicalPath]]
